talk.chat:
Trader Harmony:
Oh, the birds are singing and the sun is shining! What a beautiful day!
Oh, a customer! I didn't see you there! Well, what can I do for you on this fine day, my friend?
Buy supplies and minerals.
Buy dyes.
Ask about the local lord and tax rate.
Quest

Trader Harmony:
Oh! Oh! Oh! I am so pleased to meet you! Aren't you the famous fugitive that has the whole village gossiping? How did you fool the guards? I can't believe I'm seeing you in person. Hmm ... What should I ask you first?
Just why are the village guards looking for you anyway? You punished the bad lords and helped the poor people, right? Isn't that it? Have I been reading too many stories?
